rows.label: qst620304_msg0002
rows.name:
There's your white sand, there's your
water, all pretty and everything...
What do you think..?

rows.label: qst620304_msg0003
rows.name: Oh, it's a nice place all right.

rows.label: qst620304_msg0004
rows.name:
But I think it might be might be missing
a little, uh, how can I put it...?

rows.label: qst620304_msg0005
rows.name:
What I mean is, it seems a bit unsafe,
and certainly very pretty in the day, but
what about when it gets dark...?

rows.label: qst620304_msg0006
rows.name:
When it comes to proposing, I think
nighttime is the way to go.

rows.label: qst620304_msg0009
rows.name: See, Rex? You do get it after all!

rows.label: qst620304_msg0010
rows.name:
Yeah, proposing with a Posystone ring
under the light of the aurora...

rows.label: qst620304_msg0011
rows.name:
That's the stuff of dreams!
I can't think of a more perfect scene!

rows.label: qst620304_msg0012
rows.name:
So, do you know a good spot for seeing
the lights?

rows.label: qst620304_msg0013
rows.name: If I had to guess, maybe Godsford Isle?

rows.label: qst620304_msg0014
rows.name: Let's go check it out, then.

rows.label: qst620304_msg0015
rows.name:
And I'd like to get a more feminine
perspective on this. Maybe one of the
lovely ladies traveling with you?
